abstract: With commodity prices falling, big domestic and international players in oil and gas like Statoil, Sinopec, Kinder Morgan and Energy Transfer are tapping their vast cash reserves to buy companies.
snippet: With commodity prices falling, big domestic and international players in oil and gas like Statoil, Sinopec, Kinder Morgan and Energy Transfer are tapping their vast cash reserves to buy companies.

headline.main: Energy Deals See an Upswing as Bargains Abound
headline.print_headline: Energy Deals On Upswing As Bargains Abound
